import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Navbar(props){ const [linktext,setlinktext] = useState(' '); const toggleonclick = () =>{ if(linktext===' ') setlinktext('active'); else setlinktext(' '); } return(
{props.title}
